citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:52pm on April 8,
2021. When the inspector spoke with the facility contact on the phone at 12:56pm, he stated that he was out of the state
for business and there were no other facility representatives available for the inspection.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:52pm on April 8, 
2021.  When the inspector spoke with the facility contact on the phone at 12:56pm, he stated that he was out of the state 
for business and there were no other facility representatives available for the inspection. 
 
 
 
End Section
